comment.text: E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase that mediates ubiquitination of Delta receptors, which act as ligands of Notch proteins. Positively regulates the Delta-mediated Notch signaling by ubiquitinating the intracellular domain of Delta, leading to endocytosis of Delta receptors.
S-ubiquitinyl-[E2 ubiquitin-conjugating enzyme]-L-cysteine + [acceptor protein]-L-lysine = [E2 ubiquitin-conjugating enzyme]-L-cysteine + N(6)-ubiquitinyl-[acceptor protein]-L-lysine.

isoform.text: No experimental confirmation available. Contains a N-acetylmethionine at position 1.
No experimental confirmation available. Contains a N-acetylmethionine at position 1.

comment.text: Expressed in skeletal muscle, and to a lesser extent in heart, brain and kidney.

Down-regulated in many primary skin melanomas. Treatment with a demethylating agent, 5'-aza-2-deoxycytidine, restores expression, suggesting that down-regulation is the result of methylation of the gene.
